item.title: NHLViewer beta performance affected
item.description: Earlier today, the beta service was affected heavily. I am currently monitoring for further evaluation.
item.content:encoded:
Earlier today, the beta service was affected heavily. I am currently monitoring for further evaluation.

2022-10-24T08:53:10.000Z
Resolved

This issue has been resolved.

item.title: NHLViewer beta upstream issue
item.description: We have detected downtime on one of our beta services utilizing Render. You can still use the stable version. Track the incident from Render here: https://status.render.com/incidents/mnmbhg8hl7kd
item.content:encoded:
We have detected downtime on one of our beta services utilizing Render. You can still use the stable version. Track the incident from Render here: https://status.render.com/incidents/mnmbhg8hl7kd

2022-10-04T01:39:49.000Z
Identified

Render is still working on a fix for the downtime. No ETA at the moment.

2022-10-05T02:52:15.000Z
Resolved

Render has pushed out a fix and the beta service is now operational. If the issue arises again, this will be reopened.

item.title: Migrating edge APIs
item.description: This will take about an hour to complete.
item.content:encoded:
This will take about an hour to complete.

2022-09-30T23:21:29.000Z
Update

CDNs are back up. ðŸ˜ƒ Working on getting the PKI to at least functional again.

2022-09-30T23:49:09.000Z
Resolved

Migration is complete. There is some last few issues to resolve but are very minor.

item.title: Migrating GitLab Instance to OVH
item.description: This will take about an hour to complete.
item.content:encoded:
This will take about an hour to complete.

2022-09-21T03:40:03.000Z
Resolved

Migration is complete.

item.title: Issue with NHLViewer frontend
item.description: There is an ongoing issue with the upstream DNS provider. https://status.heroku.com/incidents/2453
item.content:encoded:
There is an ongoing issue with the upstream DNS provider. https://status.heroku.com/incidents/2453

2022-08-24T01:05:43.000Z
Resolved

Looks like the issue was resolved.

item.title: Migrating GitLab Instance
item.description: This migration will take up to an hour to complete.
item.content:encoded:
This migration will take up to an hour to complete.

2022-08-23T02:02:22.000Z
Resolved

Migration is complete.

item.title: CloudFlare Issue
item.description: A CloudFlare issue is impacting the following services.
item.content:encoded:
A CloudFlare issue is impacting the following services.

2022-06-21T07:21:46.000Z
Monitoring

Issue seems to be somewhat fixed.

2022-06-21T07:44:46.000Z
Resolved

Issue seems to be resolved on CloudFlare's end with my service(s). As a result, I am marking this issue as resolved.

item.title: Acidity V3 API Cert Issue
item.content:encoded:
Certificate needs to be renewed.

2022-03-09T23:26:52.000Z
Resolved

Certificate has been renewed.

item.title: Roblox experiencing issues again
item.description: RBXExchange is affected by the current Roblox outage again. Please wait for a fix.
item.content:encoded:
RBXExchange is affected by the current Roblox outage again. Please wait for a fix.

2022-02-20T07:04:32.000Z
Update

Roblox is slowly coming back for some users.

2022-02-20T09:32:52.000Z
Resolved

Roblox is operational for most regions and RBXExchange is now stable.

item.title: Roblox experiencing issues
item.description: RBXExchange is affected by the current Roblox outage. Please wait for a fix.
item.content:encoded:
RBXExchange is affected by the current Roblox outage. Please wait for a fix.

2022-02-19T21:31:51.000Z
Resolved

Issue has been fixed.

item.title: RBXExchange Authentication Maintenance
item.description: RBXExchange will be undergoing authentication maintenance at this time.
item.content:encoded:
RBXExchange will be undergoing authentication maintenance at this time.

2022-02-19T18:55:32.000Z
Resolved

RBXExchange is operational.

item.title: RBXExchange initial setup
item.description: RBXExchange is being worked on today and will most likely be finished tonight.
item.content:encoded:
RBXExchange is being worked on today and will most likely be finished tonight.

2022-02-18T03:51:11.000Z

RBXExchange is still being worked on.

2022-02-18T06:53:19.000Z
Resolved

RBXExchange is operational.

item.title: PKI API Maintenance
item.description: The PKI API will go under maintenance for adding certain features that impact the PKI CA CDN.
item.content:encoded:
The PKI API will go under maintenance for adding certain features that impact the PKI CA CDN.

2022-01-27T12:03:19.000Z
Resolved

PKI API maintenance complete.

item.title: PKI CA CDN not working
item.description: Investigating an issue regarding the global PKI CA CDN.
item.content:encoded:
Investigating an issue regarding the global PKI CA CDN.

2022-01-27T08:26:39.000Z
Resolved

PKI CA CDN has been redeployed and is up and operational. Updates will be made to ensure that it is fully functional.

item.title: Migrating to new PKI landing page
item.description: This does not have to do with the actual PKI API but the main PKI landing page. Migration should be complete within an hour.
item.content:encoded:
This does not have to do with the actual PKI API but the main PKI landing page. Migration should be complete within an hour.

2021-11-21T02:10:50.000Z
Resolved

Migration complete.

2021-11-05T00:23:24.000Z

item.content:encoded:
